channel.title: Client help, cmon pros!
channel.description: I changed the name of a glory to bobs necklace through a cache editor & it worked. The problem is that I can't equip anything with that client... I can equip items with one client but not the one with the edited bobs necklace, how come? How may i fix this

item.title: Client help, cmon pros!

item.description:
